Package org.perfidix.ouput.asciitable

This package offers classes which are used for an ascii-based tabluar output.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTabularComponent
    This abstract class represents all drawable items in this NiceTable.
    DynamicLine
    A dynamic, extensible line.
    Header  
    NiceTable
    This class represents a table which allows formatting of data as an ascii table.
    Row
    A table's row contains the data, keeps a reference to its parent and computes its own width.
    Util
    Utilities for the ascii table.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractTabularComponent.Alignment
    Alignment in the cells.

Package org.perfidix.ouput.asciitable Description

This package offers classes which are used for an ascii-based tabluar output. Several modules are given to build an ascii-based tabluar based on row, columnds and headers.
